    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AbandonedShip
    Represents the AbandonedShip adventure card.
    AbandonedShipState
    Represents the game state when the current adventure card is an AbandonedShip.
    AbandonedStation
    Represents the AbandonedStation adventure card.
    AbandonedStationState
    Represents the state in which a player is presented with an AbandonedStation adventure card.
    AbortFlightAction
    Action that allows a player to abort the current flight.
    AcceptAdventureCardAction
    Action that allows a player to accept their drawn AdventureCard.
    AdventureCard
    Abstract base class for all adventure cards in the game.
    AdventureCard.Type
     
    AdventureCardCLI
     
    AdventureCardLoader
     
    AdventureController
     
    AdventureControllerLv1
     
    AdventureControllerLv2
     
    AdventureDeck
    Represents a deck of AdventureCards used during the game.
    AdventurePhase
    Represents the Adventure Phase of the game where each player draws and resolves an AdventureCard.
    AdventurePhaseData
     
    AdventurePhaseData.AdventureState
     
    AdventurePhaseData.AdventureStateGUI
     
    AdventurePROVA
     
    AdventureState
    Abstract class representing a state in the AdventurePhase of the game.
    AdventureTemplate
     
    AdvShipBoardHandleLv1Controller
     
    AdvShipBoardHandleLv2Controller
     
    AdvShipBoardLv1Controller
     
    AdvShipBoardLv2Controller
     
    AlienUnit
    Represents an AlienUnit, a special type of ShipCard
    AlienUnit.Type
    Defines the possible types of Alien Units
    Battery
    Represents a Battery, a specialized type of ShipCard
    Battery.Type
    Defines the possible types of Batteries
    BuildingController
     
    BuildingEnemyShipboardLv1Controller
     
    BuildingEnemyShipboardLv2Controller
     
    BuildingLv1Controller
     
    BuildingLv2Controller
     
    BuildingPhaseData
    Represents the client-side state during the Building Phase of the game.
    BuildingPhaseData.BuildingState
     
    BuildingPhaseLv2
    Represents the second level of the building phase in the game.
    BuildingPhaseTrial
    Represents a simplified trial version of the building phase in the game.
    BuildingTemplate
     
    Cannon
    Represents a Cannon, a specialized type of ShipCard
    Cannon.Type
    Defines the possible types of Cannons
    Check1Lv2
    Represents the first combat check state at Combat Zone Level 2 during the Adventure Phase.
    Check2Lv1
    Represents the state within the Adventure Phase at Combat Zone Level 1, where each player must determine their engine power using available batteries.
    Check2Lv2
    Represents the second combat check state at Combat Zone Level 2 during the Adventure Phase.
    Check3Lv1
    Represents the state within the Adventure Phase at Combat Zone Level 1, where each player must determine their firepower using available batteries and cannons.
    Check3Lv2
    Represents the third combat check state at Combat Zone Level 2 during the Adventure Phase.
    CheckAndPenalty1Lv1
    Represents the state in the Adventure Phase for Combat Zone Level 1, where the player with the least crew members receives a penalty.
    CheckController
     
    CheckEnemyShipboardLv1Controller
     
    CheckEnemyShipboardLv2Controller
     
    CheckLv1Controller
     
    CheckLv2Controller
     
    CheckPhase
    Represents the Check Phase of the game, where all player ship boards are validated after the building phase.
    CheckPhaseData
    Represents the client-side data and behavior for the "Check Phase" of the game, where players validate and potentially fix their ship configurations.
    CheckPhaseData.CheckState
     
    CheckTemplate
     
    ChooseColorAction
    Action that allows a player to choose their color.
    ChooseEnginePowerAction
    Action that allows a player to choose their engine power distribution across batteries.
    ChooseFirePowerAction
    Action that allows a player to choose their firepower distribution across batteries and cannons.
    ChooseHousing
    Represents the state in which a player must choose which crew members to sacrifice after accepting an AbandonedShip adventure card.
    ChooseMaterialsAction
    Action that allows a player to choose which materials to move into or out of storage.
    ChooseMaterialsSmugglers
    Adventure state representing the resolution of a Smugglers adventure card.
    ChooseMaterialStation
    Represents the state in the Adventure Phase where a player must choose materials when interacting with an Abandoned Station adventure card.
    ChoosePlanetController
     
    ChoosePlanetMaterialsAction
    Action that allows a player to move materials into or out of a planet's storage.
    CLIController
     
    Client
    Abstract base class representing a network client in the game.
    ClientControllerAction
    Action that allows a client request to be handled by the ServerController.
    ClientGameAction
    Action that serves as the base for all game actions initiated by a client.
    ClientGameMessage
    Represents a message sent by a client to the server during the game phase, used in the socket-based communication model.
    ClientInterface
     
    ClientRMI
    An implementation of a network client that communicates with the server using Java RMI (Remote Method Invocation).
    ClientSession
    Represents a client session on the server
    ClientSocket
    A network client that communicates with the server using raw TCP sockets and object streams.
    ClientStubExporter
    Exports a remote RMI stub that the server can use to send actions to the client.
    CLITemplate
     
    CombatZoneController
     
    CombatZoneLv1
    Represents a Level 1 Combat Zone adventure card.
    CombatZoneLv2
    Represents a Level 2 Combat Zone adventure card.
    CompletedAlienSelectionAction
    Action that allows a player to complete their alien selection phase.
    ConnectToGameAction
    Action that allows a client to connect to a specified game match.
    Controller
     
    CoordinatesInput
     
    CoordinateState
    Represents the state in which players defeated by pirates must roll to determine the coordinates of the next incoming shot during a Pirates event.
    CreateMatchAction
    Action that allows a client to create a new game match with the specified flight level and player count.
    CreateMatchController
     
    CreateOrJoinController
     
    DeclineAdventureCardAction
    Action that allows a player to decline their drawn AdventureCard.
    Dice
    Represents a standard six-sided die.
    EndBuildingLevel2Action
    Action that allows a player to complete the second level of building at a specified position.
    EndBuildingTrialAction
    Action that allows a player to complete the building trial phase.
    EndController
     
    EndGameController
     
    EndGamePhase
    Represents the Endgame Phase of the game.
    EndPhaseData
    Represents the client-side data and logic for the end phase of the game.
    EndPhaseData.EndState
     
    EndTemplate
     
    Engine
    Represents an Engine, a specialized type of ShipCard
    Engine.Type
    Defines the possible types of Engines.
    EnterInput
     
    Epidemic
    Represents an Epidemic adventure card.
    EpidemicState
    Represents the state of the game in which an epidemic event is triggered and must be resolved.
    FlightBoard
    Represents the flight board used during the space phase of the game.
    FlightBoard.Type
     
    FlightBoardCLI
     
    FullLobbyException
     
    GalaxyTrucker
     
    GameAlreadyStartedException
     
    GameContext
    Acts as the controller for a single match instance.
    GameModel
    Represents the main model of the game Galaxy Trucker.
    GamePhase
    Abstract class representing a generic phase of the game.
    GamePhaseData
    Abstract base class representing the data and behavior of a client-side game phase.
    GetAdventureCardAction
    Action that allows a player to draw an AdventureCard.
    GetAvailableMatchesAction
    Action that allows a client to request the current list of available matches.
    GetCoordinateAction
    Action that allows a player to retrieve the next hit coordinate from the game context.
    GetEnemiesShipBoardAction
    Action that allows a player to request the ship boards of all enemies.
    GetFreeShipCardAction
    Action that allows a player to obtain a free ship card (or skip by passing a placeholder).
    GetPlayersColorAction
    Action that allows a player to request the current mapping of all players' colors.
    GimmeACoolShipAction
    Action that allows a player to request a "cool" ship board from the server.
    HandleHit
    Represents the state in the Pirates event where each defeated player must handle an incoming Shot at a specific coordinate.
    HandleMeteor
    Represents the state in which a player must defend against an incoming meteor during a MeteorSwarm event in the game.
    HandleShotAction
    Action that allows a player to handle an incoming shot by allocating power from batteries.
    HandleShotLv1
    Represents the state in the Adventure Phase at Combat Zone Level 1, handling the logic when a player's ship is hit by a shot.
    HandleShotLv2
    Represents the state at Combat Zone Level 2 where a single shot is applied to a player's ship.
    Hit
    Represents an abstract hit on the shipboard, which can be either small or big, and coming from one of the four cardinal directions.
    Hit.Direction
     
    Hit.Type
     
    HorizontalMenuInput
     
    HousingUnit
    Represents a HousingUnit, a special type of ShipCard
    IdlePhase
    Represents the initial phase of the game, where players can join the lobby and choose their colors.
    IdleState
    Represents the initial state of the AdventurePhase, in which no player is currently resolving an adventure card.
    InputHandler
     
    InputRequest
     
    IntegerInput
     
    JoiningController
     
    JoiningPhaseData
    Represents the client-side state during the joining phase of the game.
    JoiningPhaseData.JoiningState
     
    JoiningTemplate
     
    JoinMatchController
     
    JoinMatchController.MatchEntry
     
    KillMembersAction
    Action that allows a player to kill crew members according to housing usage limits.
    LandedPlanet
    Represents the state in which a Player has landed on a planet (from a PlanetsCard) and can choose materials to load into their ship's Storage.
    LandOnPlanet
    Represents the state in which a Player chooses which planet to land on from a PlanetsCard during the resolution of a planets-type adventure.
    LandOnPlanetAction
    Action that allows a player to land on a specified planet.
    Level1ShipBoard
    Represents a level 1 shipboard, extending the general ShipBoard class
    Level2ShipBoard
    Represents a level 2 shipboard, extending the general ShipBoard class
    Level3ShipBoard
    Represents a level 3 shipboard, extending the general ShipBoard class
    ListIndexInput
     
    LoadACoolShipAction
    Action that loads the specified ShipBoard into the Building phase data.
    LobbyController
     
    LoginController
     
    LooseBatteriesSmugglers
    Adventure state used to handle the battery loss penalty associated with a Smugglers adventure card.
    LooseState
    Represents the state where a Player has lost a combat against the Slavers during the AdventurePhase of the game.
    MainCLI
     
    MainGUI
     
    Material
    Represents a material in the game.
    Material.Type
    Defines the possible types of materials
    MaterialCLI
    Handles the CLI (Command Line Interface) representation of materials using colored symbols.
    MenuInput
     
    Meteor
    Represents a meteor-type hit that can strike the spaceship.
    MeteorDefenseAction
    Action that allows a player to defend against a meteor by allocating power from batteries and firing a cannon.
    MeteorsController
     
    MeteorSwarm
    Represents a Meteor Swarm adventure card.
    MeteorSwarmState
    Represents the state in which a meteor from a MeteorSwarm adventure card is about to impact.
    MiniDeckController
     
    NetworkException
     
    NotifyExceptionAction
    Action that carries an exception message from the server and injects it into each phase's view data.
    NotifyNewHit
    Action that notifies whether the player has a new hit to process during the Adventure phase.
    NotifySuccessAction
    Action signaling that the previous server request was successful.
    NotifyWinLose
    Action that notifies the game result (win, lose, or draw) to the Adventure phase, so the UI can display the appropriate outcome.
    NotifyWinLose.Response
     
    ObserveMiniDeckAction
    Action that allows a player to observe the mini deck of AdventureCards.
    OpenSpace
    Represents an Open Space adventure card.
    OpenSpaceState
    Represents the state in which players traverse open space during the Adventure Phase.
    Penalty1Lv2
    Represents the penalty state at Combat Zone Level 2 where the player with the lowest firepower is penalized by moving backward on the route.
    Penalty2Lv1
    Represents the state in the Adventure Phase at Combat Zone Level 1, where the player with the lowest engine power must apply a penalty by removing crew members from their ship.
    Penalty2Lv2
    Represents the penalty state at Combat Zone Level 2 where the player with the lowest engine power must discard a set of materials from their ship.
    Penalty3Lv1
    Represents the state in the Adventure Phase at Combat Zone Level 1, where a defeated player must handle a sequence of hits, one at a time.
    Penalty3Lv2
    Represents the third penalty state at Combat Zone Level 2, where a player must handle one or more hits after being identified as the weakest based on crew count.
    PingAction
    Action that allows a client to ping the server to keep the connection alive.
    Pirates
    Represents a Pirates adventure card.
    PiratesController
     
    PiratesState
    Represents the state in the Adventure Phase where the player's ship must confront a Pirates encounter by choosing firepower.
    PlaceShipCardAction
    Action that allows a player to place a ShipCard on their ShipBoard at specified coordinates.
    Planet
    Represents a planet in the game, which can contain materials of various types and can be visited by a player.
    PlanetsCard
    Represents a Planets adventure card.
    PlanetsState
    Represents the state in which a player must decide whether to accept or decline a PlanetsCard during the adventure phase.
    Player
    Rappresenta un giocatore nel gioco, con attributi come username, colore, monete, posizione, e una ShipBoard associata che rappresenta la sua astronave.
    Player.Color
     
    PlayerContext
    Represents the client-side context of a player, tracking their current game phase and connection status.
    PongAction
    Action representing a server "pong" response, typically used to keep the connection alive or acknowledge a ping.
    previewCLI
     
    RegisterRMISessionAction
    Action that registers an RMI session for a connecting client.
    RegisterSocketSessionAction
    Action that allows a client to register a socket-based session.
    ReleaseMiniDeckAction
    Action that allows a player to release the mini deck back into the game.
    ReleaseShipCardAction
    Action that allows a player to release a previously held ship card back into the free pool.
    RemoveShipCardAction
    Action that allows a player to remove a ship card from their ShipBoard at the specified coordinates.
    RepairShipBoardAction
    Action that allows a player to repair their ship by removing damaged cards at specified coordinates.
    ReserveShipCardAction
    Action that allows a player to reserve a ship card, adding it to their board.
    ResetBuildingTimerAction
    Action that allows a player to reset the building phase timer.
    RewardDecisionAction
    Action that allows a player to accept or decline a reward decision.
    SelectAliensAction
    Action that allows a player to select an AlienUnit and assign it to a HousingUnit.
    SelectAlienUnitController
     
    SelectAlienUnitState
    Represents the state within the AdventurePhase where each player selects an AlienUnit and places it into a HousingUnit on their ShipBoard.
    SelectColorController
     
    SelectNetworkController
     
    SendAdventureCardAction
    Action that sends an AdventureCard to the client UI and optionally updates the game state for a specified player during the Adventure phase.
    SendAvailableMatchesAction
    Action that provides the list of available matches during the Joining phase.
    SendBuildingTimerAction
    Action that sends the current building phase timer information, including the expiration instant, remaining timer count, and whether to update state.
    SendFreeShipCardAction
    Action that sends the free ship card selection data to the Building phase view, including the chosen card, pool of available cards, and the count of remaining cards.
    SendHandleMessageAction
    Action that delivers a handle message to the Adventure phase view.
    SendHitAction
    Action that sends a Hit event to the Adventure phase view.
    SendMaterialsAction
     
    SendMiniDeckAction
    Action that sends the mini deck of AdventureCards to the Building phase view.
    SendSessionDataAction
    Action that sends the player's session data (username and token) to the Joining phase view.
    Server
    Abstract class representing a network server that mediates communication between clients and the core game logic This class handles common game-related operations, while delegating connection-specific methods to its subclasses (e.g., ServerRMI, ServerSocket)
    ServerAction
    Base class for all actions sent from the server to the client.
    ServerController
    The ServerController class is the central authority for managing active player sessions and available game matches.
    ServerInterface
     
    ServerMAIN
     
    ServerRMI
    RMI-based implementation of the server interface that delegates core logic to the ServerController
    ServerSocket
    Socket-based implementation of the server interface that delegates core logic to the ServerController
    SetAdventurePhaseAction
    Action that sets up the Adventure phase by initializing the AdventurePhaseData with the flight board, current player, enemies, and designates whose turn it is.
    SetBuildingPhaseAction
    Action that sets up the Building phase by initializing the BuildingPhaseData with the ship board, free ship card count, flight type, player list, timer expiration, and remaining timers.
    SetCheckPhaseAction
    Action that sets up the Check phase by initializing the CheckPhaseData with the ship board and list of player usernames.
    SetEndGameAction
    Action that transitions the client into the End phase with the player and enemies data
    SetJoiningPhaseAction
    Action that transitions the client into the Joining phase.
    SetTestDeckAction
    Action that allows a player to set the game to use a test AdventureCard deck.
    Shield
    Represents a Shield, a defensive component of a ShipCard
    ShipBoard
    Represents a ship's board where ship components can be placed and managed
    ShipBoardCLI
    Handles the CLI (Command Line Interface) rendering of the ShipBoard
    ShipBoardLoader
     
    ShipCard
    Represents an abstract ShipCard that defines the structure of a ship's component
    ShipCard.Connector
    Defines the possible types of connectors for a ShipCard
    ShipCard.Orientation
    Defines the possible orientations for a ShipCard.
    ShipCardCLI
    CLI (Command Line Interface) renderer for ShipCard elements
    ShipCardLoader
     
    Shot
    Represents a shot that can strike the game board.
    Slavers
    Represents a Slavers adventure card.
    SlaversState
    Represents the combat state when a Player is facing the Slavers adventure card during the AdventurePhase.
    Smugglers
    Represents a Smugglers adventure card.
    SmugglersState
    Adventure state representing the resolution of a Smugglers encounter where players must compare their ship's firepower against that of the smugglers.
    SplashScreenController
     
    StarDust
    Represents a StarDust adventure card.
    StarDustState
    Concrete state of the AdventurePhase representing the "Star Dust" card.
    Storage
    Represents a Storage, a specialized type of ShipCard
    Storage.Type
    Defines the possible types of storage
    StringInput
     
    StructuralModule
    Represents a StructuralModule, a basic component of a ShipCard
    UpdateAvailableShipCardsAction
    Action that updates the list of free ship cards during the Building phase.
    UpdateCurrentPlayerAction
    Action that updates the identifier of the current player in the Adventure phase and optionally triggers a GUI/state update.
    UpdateEnemyProfileAction
    Action that updates an enemy player's profile in the Adventure phase.
    UpdateEnemyShipBoardAction
    Action that updates an enemy player's ShipBoard in the Building and Check phases.
    UpdateEverybodyProfileAction
    Action that updates the profiles of all players (self and enemies) in the Adventure phase, refreshing the GUI and setting the active player.
    UpdatePlayerProfileAction
    Action that updates the local player's profile in the Adventure phase, refreshing the GUI and setting the active player context.
    UpdatePlayersColorAction
    Action that updates the mapping of player identifiers to their assigned display colors during the Joining phase.
    UpdateRemoveShipCardAction
    Action that removes a ship card from a specified ship board during the Building phase.
    UpdateShipBoardAction
    Action that updates the ShipBoard view in both the Building and Check phases.
    UseBatteriesAction
    Action that allows a player to allocate power from batteries for an action.
    UseReservedShipCardAction
    Action that allows a player to use a previously reserved ShipCard at specified coordinates.
    UsernameAlreadyTakenException
     
    Utils
     
    Utils.ConnectionType
     
    ViewModel
     
    VirtualClient
    Abstract representation of a connected client on the server side.
    VirtualRMIClient
    RMI-based implementation of a VirtualClient, representing a remote client connected via Java RMI.
    VirtualServer
    Handles the local client-side logic and acts as an intermediary between the UI layer (via PlayerContext) and the network communication layer (via Client).
    VirtualSocketClient
    Socket-based implementation of VirtualClient, representing a connected player on the server side.
    WinAgainstPirates
    Represents the state where a player has successfully defeated the pirates during the Pirate encounter.
    WinSmugglersState
    Adventure state triggered when a player wins a confrontation against a Smugglers card.
    WinState
    Represents the state reached when a player successfully wins against the Slavers card during the adventure phase of the game.
